full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement 

### Project Title
M7594-231465: Kiln-Dried Wood Shavings RFP

### Project Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a supplier to provide kiln-dried wood shavings on an "as and when requested" basis. The wood shavings are required for use at the Pakenham Breeding Farm and Ottawa Stable. 

### Tender Details

* **Posting Date**: January 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Period**: 1 year, with three (3) optional one-year periods
* **Number of Contracts**: Up to two contracts may be awarded as a result of this solicitation
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest responsive bid per destination

### Tender Documents
Please access the tender documents via the Ariba Discovery platform. Please disregard the initial closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by February 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EST.

### Contracting Entity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting entity for this tender.

### End User
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is the end user for this tender.

### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns related to this tender, please contact:
Hiltz, Jackson
SPAC/PSPC
Phone: Not available
Email: [jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Public Information
For more information on this tender, please visit the Ariba Discovery platform.

### Standard Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements are applicable to this tender:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Legal Cl
